SA10n1071:9: tasmāt kāryabhūtāpi janmamaraṇaparaṃparā avicchedaprabandhena bhavasaṃtatirapi bhaviṣyatīti |
SA10n1071:20: kāma jānāmi te mūlaṃ saṃkalpātkila jāyase |
SA10n1071:21: na tvāṃ saṃkalpayiṣyāmi tato me na bhaviṣyasi ||
SA10n1071:27: tatra hi śubhamākāraṃ pratītya rāga utpadyate,
SA10n1071:40: te svabhāvānna vidyante tasmāt kleśā na tattvataḥ ||2 ||
SA10n1071:54: atha syāt - yadi astitvanāstitve ātmano na staḥ,
SA10n1071:56: yatasteṣāmapi astitvanāstitve na staḥ iti ? ucyate -
SA10n1071:57: kasyaciddhi bhavantīme kleśāḥ sa ca na sidhyati |
SA10n1071:58: kaścidāho vinā kaṃcitsanti kleśā na kasyacit ||4 ||
SA10n1071:59: iha amī rāgādayaḥ kuḍayaṃ citravat phalaṃ pakkatādivacca utpattau āśrayamapekṣante |
SA10n1071:62: sa ca āśrayaḥ parikalpyamānaḥ ātmā vā cittaṃ vā bhavet |
SA10n1071:64: taṃ ca kaṃcidāśrayaṃ vinā kasya kleśā bhavantu?
SA10n1071:67: āho vinā kaṃcit santi kleśā na kasyacit ||4 ||
SA10n1071:68: atrāha - naiva hi kleśānāṃ kaścidāśrayaḥ pūrvaṃ siddho'bhyupagamyate |
SA10n1071:72: kiṃ tarhi kliṣṭaṃ cittaṃ pratītya kleśā upajāyante,
SA10n1071:75: svakāyadṛṣṭivat kleśāḥ kliṣṭe santi na pañcadhā |
SA10n1071:79: yatheyaṃ pañcadhā vicāryamāṇā svakāye na saṃbhavati,
SA10n1071:80: skandhā na nānyaḥ skandhebhyo nāsmin skandhā na teṣu saḥ |
SA10n1071:82: ityanena | evaṃ kliṣṭe'pi kleśā vicāryamāṇāḥ pañcadhā na saṃbhavanti |
SA10n1071:83: tatra kliśyantīti kleśā kliśyate iti kliṣṭam |
SA10n1071:84: tatra yadeva kliṣṭaṃ tadeva kleśā iti na yujyate dagdhṛdāhyayorapyekatva prasaṅgāt |
SA10n1071:89: ata eva ca ekatvānyatvābhāvādādhārādheyatadvatpakṣāṇāṃ ca abhāvānna kleśeṣu kliṣṭam,
SA10n1071:92: ityevaṃ kliṣṭe pañcadhā vicāryamāṇāḥ kleśā na saṃbhavanti |
SA10n1071:93: yathā ca kliṣṭahetukāḥ kleśā na saṃbhavanti,
SA10n1071:94: evaṃ kleśahetukamapi kliṣṭaṃ kleśeṣu vicāryamāṇaṃ pañcadhā na saṃbhavati |
SA10n1071:99: na ca kliṣṭe kleśāḥ na ca kleśeṣu kliṣṭam,
SA10n1071:101: ityevaṃ svakāyadṛṣṭivadeva kliṣṭaṃ kleśeṣvapi pañcadhā nāsti |
SA10n1071:111: yadā ca te na santi svabhāvataḥ , tadā -
SA10n1071:114: yadā ca te na santi svabhāvataḥ, tadā -
SA10n1071:128: vastu rāgasya dveṣasya mohasya ca vikalpyate ||7 ||
SA10n1071:134: rūpaṃ śabdā gandhā rasāḥ spraṣṭavyāni dharmāśceti |
SA10n1071:137: tena śabdena śabdyante prakāśyante padārthā iti śabdaḥ |
SA10n1071:138: gandhyante hiṃsyante yatra prāptāḥ tato'nyatrāgamanād gandhāḥ |
SA10n1071:147: āghātaḥ sattvaviṣayo'sattvaviṣayo vā dūṣyate vā anena citamiti doṣaḥ |
SA10n1071:150: tadeṣāṃ kleśānāṃ rūpādikaṃ ṣaḍvidhaṃ vastu ālambanaṃ bhavati |
SA10n1071:151: tatra śubhākārā dhyāropeṇa yathā rūpādibhyo rāga upajāyate,
SA10n1071:155: kiṃ tu avidyamānasvabhāvasattākametad rāgādīnāmālambanatvena parikalpyate bhavatā taimirikairiva asatkeśamaśakamakṣikādvicandrādikamiti pratipādayannāha -
SA10n1071:162: yathā gandharvanagarādiprakhyā ete kevalaṃ viparyāsādupalabhyante, tadā -
SA10n1071:163: aśubhaṃ vā śubhaṃ vāpi kutasteṣu bhaviṣyati |
SA10n1071:167: bījaṃ yasyānṛtaṃ tasya prarohaḥ satyataḥ kutaḥ ||
SA10n1071:175: iha yadi śubhaṃ nāma kiṃcit syāt,
SA10n1071:183: yadaśubhaṃ pratītya yadaśubhamapekṣya śubhaṃ prajñapayemahi vyavasthāpayemahi |
SA10n1071:186: yataśca evaṃ śubhasya prajñaptau saṃbandhyantaramapekṣaṇīya maśubhākhyaṃ padārthāntaraṃ nāsti,
SA10n1071:193: yadi hi aśubhaṃ nāma kiṃcit syāt,
SA10n1071:205: yataścaivamaśubhasya prajñaptau saṃbandhyantaramapekṣaṇīyaṃ śubhākhyaṃ padārthāntaraṃ nāsti,
SA10n1071:208: avidyamāne ca śubhe kuto rāgo bhaviṣyati |
SA10n1071:210: śubhāśubhanimittakayo rāgadveṣayoḥ śubhāśubhanimittābhāve sati nirhetukatvānnāsti saṃbhava ityabhiprāyaḥ ||12 ||
SA10n1071:211: tadevaṃ śubhāśubhanimittābhāvena rāgadveṣayorabhāvamupapādya viparyāsasvabhāvābhāvapratipādanena mohasyāpyadhunā svabhāvābhāvaṃ pratipādayannāha -
SA10n1071:213: nānityaṃ vidyate śūnye kuto grāho viparyayaḥ ||13 ||
SA10n1071:215: tadyathā - anitye pratikṣaṇavināśini skandhapañcake yo nityamiti grāhaḥ,
SA10n1071:217: anityasya dhruvā pīḍā pīḍā yasya na tatsukham |
SA10n1071:221: tasmādduḥkhātmake skandhapañcake yaḥ sukhamiti viparīto grāhaḥ,
SA10n1071:226: yaḥ śayīta sa nārīṇāṃ śayīta jaghanodare || ityādi |
SA10n1071:234: atredānīṃ vicāryate - yadi nityatvaṃ nityadarśanaṃ svabhāvaśūnyeṣu nityagrāho viparyāsa ityevaṃ vyavasthāpyate,
SA10n1071:235: nanu ca svabhāvaśūnyeṣu skandheṣu anityatvamapi nāsti, iti
SA10n1071:236: nānityaṃ vidyate śūnye kuto grāho viparyayaḥ |
SA10n1071:237: anityatvaṃ hi viparītamapekṣya nityatvaṃ viparyāsa iti vyavasthāpyate |
SA10n1071:240: tadā kutastadvirodhi nityatvaṃ nityadarśanaviparyāso bhaviṣyatīti bhāvaḥ |
SA10n1071:242: yathā ca anityatvaṃ śūnye na saṃbhavati bhāvasvabhāvarahite sasvabhāvena anutpanne,
SA10n1071:261: nanu evaṃ sati svabhāvena avidyamāne padārthe anityamityapi grāho na saṃbhavati iti asāvapi kasmānna viparyāsa iti vyavasthāpyate iti pratipādayannāha -
SA10n1071:263: anityamityapi grāhaḥ śūnye kiṃ na viparyayaḥ ||14 ||
SA10n1071:264: yadā ca ubhayasyāpi vaiparītyaṃ nityasya anityasya ca,
SA10n1071:265: tadā tadvayatiriktaṃ tṛtīyamaparaṃ nāsti yanna viparyayaḥ syāt |
SA10n1071:270: yathā ca anitye nityamityevaṃ grāho viparyāso na saṃbhavati,
SA10n1071:273: bhagavānāha - kimetat kulaputra tasya bhavati yo mārgeṇa niḥsaraṇaṃ paryeṣate?
SA10n1071:274: na kulaputra tathāgatena rañjanīyān dharmān parivarjya rāgaprahāṇaṃ prajñaptam,
SA10n1071:275: evaṃ na doṣaṇīyān mohanīyāna dharmān parivarjya tathāgatena doṣamohaprahāṇaṃ prajñaptam |
SA10n1071:277: na kulaputra tathāgatāḥ kasyaciddharmasya utsargāya vā pratilambhāya vā dharmaṃ deśayanti na parijñāyai na prahāṇāya na sākṣātkriyāyai nābhisamayāya na saṃsāracaraṇatāyai na nirvāṇagamanatāyai notkṣepāya na prabhedāya |
SA10n1071:289: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra kaścideva puruṣo māyākāranāṭake pratyupasthite māyākāranirmitāṃ striyaṃ dṛṣṭvā rāgacittamutpādayet |
SA10n1071:291: so'pakramya tāmeva striyamaśubhato manasi kuryādanityato duḥkhataḥ śūnyato'nātmato manasi kuryāt |
SA10n1071:297: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra kaścideva puruṣaḥ suptaḥ svapnāntare svagṛhe rājabhāryāṃ paśyet |
SA10n1071:303: tat kiṃ manyase kulaputra api nu sa puruṣo bhītasrastaḥ palāyamānastato rājabhāryānidānabhayātparimucyeta?
SA10n1071:306: tathā hi bhagavaṃstena puruṣeṇa astriyāṃ strīsaṃjñā utpāditā,
SA10n1071:308: bhagavānāha - evameva kulaputra ihaike bhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsakopāsikā draṣṭavyāḥ,
SA10n1071:309: ye arāge rāgasaṃjñāmutpādya rāgabhayabhītā rāganiḥsaraṇaṃ paryeṣante |
SA10n1071:314: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra sa puruṣaḥ abhaye bhayasaṃjñāmutpādayedasatsamāropeṇa |
SA10n1071:315: evameva kulaputra sarvabālapṛthagjanā rāgakoṭiṃ virāgakoṭimaprajānanto rāgakoṭibhayabhītā virāgakoṭiṃ niḥsaraṇaṃ paryeṣante |
SA10n1071:317: mohakoṭiṃ śūnyatākoṭimaprajānanto mohakoṭibhayabhītāḥ śūnyatākoṭiṃ niḥsaraṇaṃ paryeṣante |
SA10n1071:318: nāhaṃ teṣāṃ kulaputra mohapuruṣāṇāṃ mārgabhāvanāṃ vadāmi |
SA10n1071:321: atrāha - yadyapi anitye nityamityevaṃ grāho viparyayo na saṃbhavati,
SA10n1071:324: tasya ca avaśyaṃ sādhanena karaṇena bhavitavyaṃ sādhakatamena nityatvādinā |
SA10n1071:325: kartrā ca bhavitavyaṃ svatantreṇa nityātmanā cittena vā |
SA10n1071:327: satyāṃ ca bhāvakaraṇakartṛkarmaṇāṃ siddhau sarvasiddheriṣṭasiddhiḥ syādasmākamiti |
SA10n1071:331: yena gṛhṇāti yogrāho grahītā yacca gṛhyate |
SA10n1071:333: iha hi kaścid grahītā yena viśeṣeṇa nityatvādinā karaṇabhūtena kiṃcit karmabhūtaṃ rūpaśabdādikaṃ vastu gṛhṇāti,
SA10n1071:334: tadyathā na saṃbhavati tathā pūrvaṃ pratipāditam |
SA10n1071:337: ityādinā yathā nityatvādikaṃ karaṇaṃ na saṃbhavati,
SA10n1071:346: tadā kuto nirhetuko grāho bhaviṣyati? tataśca-
SA10n1071:347: yena gṛhṇāti yo grāho grahītā yacca gṛhyate |
SA10n1071:352: athavā | pratyayaparīkṣādibhiḥ prakaraṇairyasmāt sarveṣāmeva karaṇakartṛkarmaṇāṃ sarvathānutpādaḥ pratipāditaḥ,
SA10n1071:357: iha hi viparyāsānugato devadatto nāma vidyate |
SA10n1071:358: na ca vinā viparyāsaiḥ sa viparyāsānugataḥ saṃbhavati |
SA10n1071:361: iha asmābhiḥ karaṇakartṛkarmaṇāmabhāvāt sarvathā grāha eva nāstīti pratipāditam | tataśca -
SA10n1071:362: avidyamāne grāhe ca mithyā vā samyageva vā |
SA10n1071:364: samyagvā mithyā vā kasyacit kiṃcidapyagṛhṇataḥ kuto viparītatvamaviparītatvaṃ veti |
SA10n1071:366: api ca | ime viparyayāḥ kasyacidiṣyamāṇāḥ viparītasya parikalpyeran,
SA10n1071:387: ardhaviparīto hi nāma yasya kiṃcidviparītaṃ kiṃcidaviparītam |
SA10n1071:388: tatra yadasya kiṃcidviparītaṃ tadviparyāso na viparyāsayati,
SA10n1071:395: bhavānidānīṃ vimṛśatu svayaṃ prajñayā madhyasthaḥ san kasya saṃbhavanti viparyāsā iti |
SA10n1071:401: na svato jāyate bhāvaḥ parato naiva jāyate |
SA10n1071:409: ātmā ca śuci nityaṃna sukhaṃ ca yadi vidyate |
SA10n1071:410: ātmā ca śuci nityaṃ ca sukhaṃ ca na viparyayaḥ ||21 ||
SA10n1071:411: yadi etāni ātmaśucinityasukhāni viparyāsā iti vyavasthāpyante,
SA10n1071:419: viparyāsapratibandhyabhāvādanātmādīnāmapi aviparyāsādīnāṃ nāsti sadbhāva iti pratipādayannāha -
SA10n1071:420: nātmā ca śuci nityaṃ ca sukhaṃ ca yadi vidyate |
SA10n1071:421: anātmāśucyanityaṃ ca naiva duḥkhaṃ ca vidyate ||22 ||
SA10n1071:422: yadi ātmā ca śuci nityaṃ ca na vidyate iti manyase,
SA10n1071:424: evaṃ sati ātmādīnāmapyabhāvād yadi etadanātmādikamaviparyāsatvena gṛhītam,
SA10n1071:428: tadā tadapi svarūpato'vidyamānatvāt ātmādivat kathaṃ na viparyāsaḥ syāt?
SA10n1071:430: asya ca yathopavarṇitaviparyāsavicārasya avidyādiprahāṇahetutvena mahārthatāṃ pratipādayannāha -
SA10n1071:433: yadā ayaṃ yogī yathoditena nyāyena viparyāsān nopalabhate,
SA10n1071:434: tadā evaṃ viparyāsānupalambhanena taddhetukā avidyā nirudhyate |
SA10n1071:435: tannirodhācca saṃskārādayaḥ avidyāhetukā jarāmaraṇa śokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsaparyantā dharmā nirudhyante ||
SA10n1071:436: avidyā hi sakalasyaiva saṃkleśagaṇasya jātyādiduḥkhasya ca hetubhūtā |
SA10n1071:437: yathā hi kāyendriyahetukāni sarvāṇi rūpīndriyāṇi kāyendriye nirudhyamāne nirudhyante,
SA10n1071:438: evamavidyāhetukāni saṃskārādīni bhavāṅgāni pravartamānāni niyatamavidyāyāṃ niruddhāyāṃ nirudhyante iti pratipādayannāha -
SA10n1071:441: asti tarhi avidyā yasyā evaṃ viparyāsa nirodhānnirodho bhavati |
SA10n1071:449: yo hi nāma sarvātmanā atyantaduḥkhāyāsakleśāsamañjase saṃsāre nirantaraphullaphalapradasaṃkleśaviṣavṛkṣe parārthodaya saṃbaddhakakṣaiḥ sādhubhiḥ prajñopāyamahānilabalairniḥśeṣaṃ tadunmūlyamānairna kevalaṃ na sāhāyyenāvatiṣṭhante,
SA10n1071:450: api khalu tadunmūlakānāmatimahānilabalānāmiva bhāvasadbhāvavādamahāśailāyamāna ivātivirodhitayā avasthito bhavān āhopuruṣikayā tasyaiva kleśaviṣavṛkṣasya jātijarāmaraṇaśokāyāsavisara duḥkhaikaphalasya sutarāṃ bhāvābhiniveśatoyāsravairāropaṇamādriyate ||
SA10n1071:451: api ca | yadi avidyādīnāṃ saṃkleśānāṃ prahāṇaṃ saṃbhavet,
SA10n1071:454: yadi syāt, tadā tattvarūpato vidyamānānāṃ vā syāt,
SA10n1071:457: tatra yadi svarūpataḥ sadbhatānāṃ kleśānāṃ prahāṇamiṣyate,
SA10n1071:460: yadi bhūtāḥ svabhāvena kleśāḥ keciddhi kasyacit |
SA10n1071:461: kathaṃ nāma prahīyeran kaḥ svabhāvaṃ prahāsyati ||24 ||
SA10n1071:462: svabhāvato vidyamānānāṃ bhāvānāṃ na śakyaḥ svabhāvo vinivartayitum |
SA10n1071:464: evaṃ yadi ime kleśāḥ svabhāvataḥ sadbhūtāḥ syuḥ |
SA10n1071:469: kasmātpunaḥ na te prahīyante ityāha - kaḥ svabhāvaṃ prahāsyatīti |
SA10n1071:476: abhūtā api kleśāḥ svabhāvena avidyamānāḥ aśakyā eva prahātum |
SA10n1071:478: evamime'pi kleśāḥ kecid yadi kasyacit svabhāvato na vidyante,
SA10n1071:483: ato yaduktam - vidyanta eva avidyādayaḥ kleśāḥ,
SA10n1071:509: rūpeṇa darśitā bodhī bodhaye rūpa darśitam |
SA10n1071:511: śabdena uttaraṃ rūpaṃ gambhīraṃ ca svabhāvataḥ |
SA10n1071:512: samaṃ rūpaṃ ca bodhiśca nānātvaṃ na sa labhyate ||
SA10n1071:514: labhyate na ca nirvāṇaṃ sa ca śabdo na labhyate |
SA10n1071:515: śabdaścāpi nirvāṇaṃ ca ubhayaṃ tanna labhyate |
SA10n1071:517: nirvāṇaṃ nivṛttireva nirvāṇaṃ ca na labhyate |
